title: 152: How to Cultivate Willpower & Discipline with Dandapani
description:
How do you improve and enhance your willpower and discipline? 

A Hindu priest, entrepreneur, TEDx speaker and a former monk of 10 years, today’s guest Dandapani has years of experience helping entrepreneurs and global companies to further their missions.

If you have something you want to start doing consistently, like reading or going to the gym, this show is for you. 

In today’s conversation, we talk about what willpower and discipline really mean, and how you can use them to change your outlook on life.

We’ll give you some quick tips about finding your purpose and building the daily habit of starting what you finish. We’ll leave you with some short practical exercises you can do to work out your passion in life and start building willpower.

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
